users.description: Contains user account information and registration details

columns.name: Full name of the user
columns.email: Email address for login and communication

orders.description: Contains order transactions and purchase history

columns.user_id: Foreign key to users table, identifies the customer
columns.product_id: Foreign key to products table, identifies the ordered item
columns.order_date: Date and time when order was placed
columns.status: Order status: pending, completed, or cancelled

products.description: Contains product catalog with inventory information

columns.name: Product name
columns.category: Product category: electronics, clothing, or food
